repairedDockerfile:
FROM badele/debian-nodejs 
MAINTAINER Bruno Adel√© "bruno@adele.im" 
# Upgrade the distribution 
RUN apt-get update 
RUN apt-get -yf upgrade 
RUN apt-get -yf dist-upgrade 

# Install nodered 
RUN npm install -g node-red pm2 && npm cache clean --force;

# Configure nodered 
RUN pm2 start /usr/bin/node-red -- -v 
RUN pm2 save 
RUN pm2 startup 

# Clean the cache and unused packages 
RUN apt-get clean 
RUN apt-get autoremove 

EXPOSE 1880 

CMD node-red
